features: Powerful Steam Iron - 1200w heating elements, heats up in 45s, 160ml water tank offers 9 minutes of continuous steaming, ironing work with steaming makes powerful steam iron
Ironing - can be used as traditional iron work with ironing board, 3 gears in temperature(203℉-302℉), reach max temperature in less than a minutes, much faster than traditional irons
Steaming - 2 gears in steaming function, max steam output up to 20g/min, released out at high speed to reach fabrics deeply and steam out wrinkles of your clothes efficiently
Nonstick Soleplate - large soleplate coated with nonstick material, enlarge the contacting area with fabrics and provide the heat needed to release the wrinkle out, friendly to all fabrics

Lightweight & Mini Size - Design to be compact and lightweight for easy to pack up and carry, suitable for a variety of fabrics like natural linen, delicate silk, cotton, wool, synthetics material, etc. NOTE: it requires experience to use this appliance well

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vertical/Horizontal/Steaming/Dry Ironing YIKA Large Soleplate Clothes Steamer As professional cleaners know, steaming will not scorch or damage most fabrics. However, when deal with sharp creases and crisp, you may need an iron. With this steamer,ironing and steaming can work together to deal with stubborn creases on both light and heavy clothes in a very efficient way.

Previous page TEMP Range 203℉~302℉ Alloy Iron Plate 3 gears of temperature to deal with different types of fabrics effectively and quickly 2 gears of steam Pressurized Steam offer a large contact area with fabrics and more steam to relax the fibers fast and quickly Steam Without Board Steam Clothes Vertically Vertial steaming is very convenient for you to relax fibers quickly and effectively ironing with steam A Steamer, An Iron Do flat steaming on an iron board like ironing to experience a new way of removing wrinkles Hot Steamer Rest Base Heat-Resistant Base unplug and place hot steamer on the base during steaming work when you have other things to do Next page 1 Large Soleplate 2 Powerful Steam 3 Vertical Steaming 4 Ironing 5 Heat Resistant Base

Indicator Light 1 when the clothes steamer is connected with electric, the yellow light is on Indicator Light 2 Press the On/Off button and the steamer is ready for ironing when the second light(green) stop flashing. Under this mode, you can do ironing work Indicator Light 3 Press On/Off button again and the steamer is ready when the third light stop flashing. Under this mode, you can press steam button to release steam Indicator Light 4 the steamer is ready when the last light stop flashing. Under this mode, you can press the steam button again to release more steam for tough wrinkles

the features of the steam iron Powerful Steamer + Efficient Mini Iron the 3 gear with steam is suggested for using on your fabrics if you are not experienced in ironing and better to apply on an extra fabric to practice before steaming your clothes Large Soleplate (203℉~302℉)45s heats upDry ironing(3 gears) work with steaming(2 gears)Lightweight and compact size
Voltage 110-120V, 60Hz Power 1200W Soleplate’s Temperature 3 gears Steaming Options 2 gears Continuous Steaming 9 minutes Water Tank 160ml Heat Up 45S Size 160x140x70mm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love how compact it is and does the job perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This little guy makes ironing easier
reviews.reviewText: After trying this out on one garment I went to my closet to iron all the stuff that's been needing pressing for months. And it's done! The iron is small enough to be light but not so small you can't finish a shirt. It heats fast and gives off a lot of steam. It only has 3 settings, low heat, medium heat with steam if you push the button and high heat with steam option. For my purposes this is perfect. I do occasional ironing, a few items at a time and I will also do mending or alterations sometimes. I find it's perfect for sewing. I set it up next to me and turn it on and off as needed because it heats so fast...no need to keep it on while I work. The ironing plate is 6 1/4 x 2 5/8. About as big as my cell phone. I find that big enough to iron clothes yet small enough to fit in folds. It's pretty too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good buy, recommended
reviews.reviewText: This works very well. Steams very well and glides across fabric.The front end is a bit too round. I kept my old iron for occasions where I may need a more tapered point.To solve the plastic tray issue, I covered it with heavy duty foil and a small hand towel. Seems to have solved the problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What a nice little iron. I love the look of it, which is why I bought it in the first place. Here is my experience:Pros: For a small iron it does the job just the same as those big ones from the store. The steamer is AMAZING! I was afraid the plastic resting pad would melt if I set the iron on it while it was hot, but no!Cons: It takes a while to cool down. I haven’t traveled with it; however, I couldn’t picture myself loading this into my luggage after using. It takes about 15-20mins to fully cool down. At home, once I’m done using it I just put on it’s resting pad and store it away. I don’t have to worry about it cooling down quickly.Heads up:1. This iron does not rest like regular irons, you have to rest it face down on the ironing board or on it resting pad. Was a bit of an adjustment for me.2. It comes with a standard length cord that does not roll up. For me, I just wrap the cord around the body of the iron and store it away on its resting pad.UPDATE: 10/22/23Unfortunately today this iron just completely stopped working. Not sure why. I simply plugged it in as usual and it won't get hot anymore. Im not even going to bother reaching out to the seller because I purchased this back in January 2023. It just not even worth my time and effort. I won't be purchasing this item again. However, I loved this little portable iron. Too bad it gave out the way it did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: This iron looks beautiful and well built. However, the first one has a minor issue that the steam does not come out consistently. The vendor promptly sent a replacement. And the new one works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after few use
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this steamer because it’s small and looking better than what’s out there. I was very happy with it the first few times I used it because it was giving a lot of steam and it was working very well. Recently I came to use it again and the steamer didn’t turn on anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not steams as expected
reviews.reviewText: Very small so good for traveling but the steam was very little. I returned this item

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Compact and easy to use. I love the base it has so you can set it down.
